name: Good News!
description:
Good News! is a short game designed in 7 days for the Historically Accurate Game Jam. 

It tells a little bit of the of Pedro Passos, a journalist and editor at a local newspaper in Rio de Janeiro. Through the path that you, the player, choose for him to go in his jornalistic texts.

Quite simple, but we are Proud of this work.

Thanks to:
Allison Santos Silva
Maria Eduarda Leite
Gabriel Ferreira Silva
Felipe Veiga Dellape
